flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=32>>32 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 32 * (2/3) = <<32*2/3=64/3>>64/3 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 32 - 64/3 = <<32-64/3=32/3>>32/3 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has 32/3 + 10 + 3 = <<32/3+10+3=71/3>>71/3 pairs of socks

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 32. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
